name: Change Group Name
format:
<script>
(function($scope) {
$scope.msg = {'payload':'Default'} // initial group placeholder name

$scope.$watch('msg', function() {
    if ($scope.msg){
        $(".nr-dashboard-cardtitle:contains('"+ $scope.oldtitle + "')").text($scope.msg.payload);
        $scope.oldtitle = $scope.msg.payload
    }
    console.log('xxx');
 });
})(scope);
</script>

    chart       : 'weather',
